title: TX6A™ Cat 6A UTP Copper Cable with Vari-MaTriX Technology
description: Upgrade your building's network with our Cat 6A UTP copper cable with Vari-MaTriX technology. This cable safeguards against fire hazards and delivers best-in-class performance.
features: Innovative Vari-MaTriX technology for alien crosstalk mitigation
Superior PoE performance for high-power devices
Improved cable fill and simplified installation
detailedDescription: The TX6A™ Category 6A UTP Copper Cable with Vari-MaTriX Technology represents our premium copper cabling solution. Designed for mission-critical applications, this cable provides exceptional alien crosstalk suppression while maintaining a smaller diameter for improved pathway fill and easier installation. Perfect for high-bandwidth applications and Power over Ethernet (PoE) installations.

title: TX6A™ Category 6A U/UTP Copper Cable
description: Improve cable fill and simplify upgrades with our Cat 6A U/UTP copper cable. It provides exceptional performance for PoE++ applications with best-in-class alien crosstalk mitigation.
detailedDescription: Our TX6A™ Category 6A U/UTP Copper Cable is designed for high-performance network applications. It features innovative design elements that minimize alien crosstalk while providing reliable high-speed connections for your infrastructure. The cable is available in multiple flammability ratings to suit various installation environments.

title: TX6™ Category 6 U/UTP Copper Cable
description: Ensure top-tier network performance with our Cat 6 U/UTP copper cable, available in multiple colors for clear labeling.
features: Multiple jacket colors for easy identification
Available in plenum and riser ratings
detailedDescription: Our TX6™ Category 6 U/UTP Copper Cable provides reliable performance for standard enterprise network applications. Designed to exceed industry standards, this cable delivers consistent transmission characteristics across all pairs, ensuring reliable performance for your critical network infrastructure.

title: TX6000™ Enhanced Category 6 U/UTP Copper Cable
description: Enhanced electrical headroom performance provides our enhanced Cat 6 U/UTP copper cable margin above industry standards and exceptional performance for PoE++ applications.
detailedDescription: The TX6000™ Enhanced Category 6 U/UTP Copper Cable is designed for demanding network applications. It features enhanced electrical headroom performance that provides margin above industry standards, making it ideal for PoE++ applications and future network upgrades.

title: TX6™ ER Category 6 U/UTP Copper Cable
description: Optimize high-power applications with our ER category 6 cable. Its larger conductors reduce heat and improve performance, ensuring reliable connections in demanding environments.
detailedDescription: The TX6™ ER Category 6 U/UTP Copper Cable is specifically designed for high-power applications. Its larger conductors reduce heat buildup and improve performance, making it ideal for demanding environments where reliable connections are crucial.

title: TX6A™ Jacketed Interlock Armor Category 6A U/UTP Copper Cable
description: Our jacketed interlock armor Category 6A U/UTP copper cable provides protection against mechanical stresses and installs faster and easier than EMT conduit and conventional wire.
detailedDescription: The TX6A™ Jacketed Interlock Armor Category 6A U/UTP Copper Cable is designed for environments requiring additional mechanical protection. Its innovative design allows for faster installation than traditional EMT conduit while providing superior protection against physical damage.

title: Utility Grade TX6A™ UTG20 Copper Cable with Vari-MaTriX Technology
description: Our UTG20 copper cable with Vari-MaTriX technology delivers superior speed and minimal interference. Flame-retardant jacket ensures safety for various installations.
detailedDescription: The Utility Grade TX6A™ UTG20 Copper Cable with Vari-MaTriX Technology is designed for utility-grade applications. It combines superior speed performance with minimal interference, making it ideal for various installation environments. The flame-retardant jacket ensures safety and compliance with industry standards.
